Content: A person has been arrested in the Sinnakudirippu area in Kalpitiya for the illegal possession conch shells. A 42-year-old resident of the area was arrested during a joint operation conducted by the Navy and the Sinnakudirippu police yesterday. According to the Fisheries and Aquatic Resources Act the possession, buying, displaying with the intention of selling, transporting or exporting of conch shells which are less than 70 mm in diameter has been banned.
